job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in Information technology, computer science, engineering, business or related courses

jd: From: Ben, Genuineitllc ben@genuineitllc.com Reply to: ben@genuineitllc.com Job Title: Oracle Apps Program Manager Job Type: Contract Location: St. Louis, MO (Need Local) Required Skills: Project/Program Management experience, Oracle Fusion is required: manufacturing, supply chain, and finance are preferred areas of knowledge. This position will be required to be on-site at the client in Missouri up to 50% of the time for up to 12 months. After that period the role may transition to primarily remote, with occasional travel for major project milestones. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Information technology, computer science, engineering, business or related courses At least 10 years of direct experience in Project Management and Program Leadership with proven record of success PMI-PMP, PMI-PgMP, or PRINCE2 certification Previous experience with Organizational Change Managementing, including Prosci, CCMP, or similar qualification a plus Previous project experience with Oracle Fusion is required: manufacturing, supply chain, and finance are preferred areas of knowledge. Able to collaborate with internal and client stakeholders, including business analysts, business users, architects, client relations, project managers and sponsors Skilled in project progress and metrics reporting for project teams through executives Able to use various project management methodologies, including agile and waterfall Experienced in balancing critical issue resolution and competing priorities Skilled in identifying client training requirements and customizing training content as needed Excellent communication skills across multiple timezones, countries and cultures required
